metadata.name: Metaverse Marriage Certificate
metadata.description:
This 1/1 NFT is Blockchain Marriage Certificate issued by NonFungibleRings & BlockChainWedding to Maggie & Jay Sloatman. They were united in Metaverse marriage in Decentraland on the 15th day of May, 2022. This is probably the first NFT marriage certificate ever issued.

This certificate has no legal power. For entertainment only. 

For questions, please contact @NonFungibleRing or @BlockChainWed on Twitter or visit nonfungiblerings.com & blockchainwedding.io

Gift your loved ones NFT Rings: opensea.io/collection/non-fungible-rings-nfr
